name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior Engineer with 8 years of experience in developing scalable solutions in distributed systems and microservices architecture. Proficient in **AWS** and **Kubernetes**, with solid expertise in implementing **Java** technologies to architect resilient applications that meet high-performance standards. Adept at leveraging **Apache Flink** for real-time data processing and integrating machine learning capabilities for advanced analytics.

My background encompasses a strong foundation in data structures and algorithms, ensuring efficient application logic. I have a proven track record of designing CI/CD pipelines for automation and robust security compliance including standards like HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2. Additionally, I possess practical experience in crafting machine learning pipelines and deploying models using **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**, contributing to intelligent automation within enterprise-grade platforms.
